reviewText: A good movie, Kind of slow i was expecting a little more action from a Stallone movie. Its kind of a Stallone chick flick.
Title: Sylvester Stallone Triple Feature: (Avenging Angelo / Eye See You / Shade)

reviewText: its funny and thrilling at the sam time and the last movies is just a good movie its worth the money buy it now or your missing out
Title: Sylvester Stallone Triple Feature: (Avenging Angelo / Eye See You / Shade)

reviewText: I must admit this was a great purchase for me as I hadn't seen 2 of the three movies on this disk...Would recommend it to all of you that enjoy Stallone...
Title: Sylvester Stallone Triple Feature: (Avenging Angelo / Eye See You / Shade)

reviewText: Eye see you is the reason I bought this one, I saw parts of the movie before and it looked good so I bought it, and it didnt disappoint me at all, and it being a triple feature was even better so it was a 3 for 1 deal for me
summary: Eye see you is the reason I bought this one, I saw parts of the movie before and it looked good so I bought it
Title: Sylvester Stallone Triple Feature: (Avenging Angelo / Eye See You / Shade)

reviewText: The films on this dvd are very entertaining...as usual.Stallone is an outstanding actor who very exciting to watch.He is a memorable individual on and off the screen.
Title: Sylvester Stallone Triple Feature: (Avenging Angelo / Eye See You / Shade)

reviewText: As TV stinks, so many of the shows are made for idiots and are just so disgusting, we have had to revert to buying some action DVD's to liven up our week end moving watching.  Even some of the new DVD's are terrible, also, so again we have reverted to some older ones.  P Pratt
Title: Sylvester Stallone Triple Feature: (Avenging Angelo / Eye See You / Shade)
